mission_data.mission_description: Advanced Training for Artemis Armada V.^^Intended for a full crew of 6-8 in Artemis 2.7.5 playing any TSN ship.^^Learn to defeat a Kralien Inquisitor.

set_ship_text.name: Montreal
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are in trouble! What should we do?

event.name: Create Kralien Inquisitor
event.incoming_comms_text: A Kralien Inquisitor has entered the sector. Your mission is to defeat it as efficiently as possible.

set_ship_text.name: Inquisitor
set_ship_text.desc: Enormous supership displacing 2,548 kilotons with a crew of 1,248
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Equiped with four self-regenerating defensive turrets.

big_message.title: VICTORY!
big_message.subtitle2: You have found a solution to the puzzle.

set_ship_text.name: Turret1
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Equiped with anti-torp and drone rack.

set_ship_text.name: Turret2
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Equiped with anti-torp and drone rack.

set_ship_text.name: Turret3
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Equiped with anti-torp and drone rack.

set_ship_text.name: Turret4
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Equiped with anti-torp and drone rack.
